title: Single Of The Week: Fleet Foxes – Grown Ocean
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/fleetfoxes.jpg "fleetfoxes")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6309-single-of-the-week-fleet-foxes-grown-ocean/attachment/fleetfoxes)This week’s choice for ‘_Single of the Week_’ isn’t exactly surprising. **Fleet Foxes** sophomore LP, _Helplessness Blues_, is one of the most anticipated albums of 2011 and with a debut single like _Grown Ocean_ it’s not hard to see why. The single is one of the most rich, lush and wonderfully carefree songs I’ve heard so far this year. Oh and the video features the band smiling fondly at each other, A LOT, but will no doubt warm the cockles of your heart. Have a great 7 days. JC

[Fleet Foxes – Grown Ocean](http://vimeo.com/21577557) from [Fleet Foxes](http://vimeo.com/user5280407) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).

Fleet Foxes sophomore LP, Helplessness Blues, is one of the most anticipated albums of 2011 and with a debut single like Grown Ocean it’s not hard to see why. The single is one of the most rich, lush and wonderfully carefree songs I’ve heard \[…\]
